Blog.post: Woh!! A Operating System doed in assembler!! This is the freaky planet!! XD This OS have a GUI and a lot of features, all writed in 32 bit assembler!!! Obviously the portability is killed xD I'm very impressed!! Some features: - Pre-emptive multitasking, multithreading, ring-3 protection - Responsive GUI with 16 M colours up to 1280x1024 - Ide: editor/compiler for assembly kernel and applications - Kernel and application sources included (GPL) - TCP/IP stack with PPP & Ethernet drivers - Http/mp3/email servers, 3D maze - Free-form, skinnable application windows - Hard real-time data fetch - Fits in a single floppy ! uf!! incredible!!!

Time?? What it's time??? (when the BlindGuardian song said) I need more time for me!! I don't have enough time to do all the work Something wan't to help me?? It's a joke, I'm so bussy and now I'm stressed. I need to clear my mind This is a nice place to said all you want. It like me!!

This is my first OpenSource project. I work hard to obtain my degree title that I studing at my University. And now, are involved in this project. Other OpenSource projects and technologis like me to study to study it, but never join into a project (I feel embrassed to make fatal errors). Now I join into the community, and I'm feel happy to announce it here at my personal blog :D Thanks to the OpenSource community for their effort. I become a new promissing member of it ;)

This is my first post Oh!! this is my first post int this blogger site!! I'm happy to post in English (at the moment). If my english is so bad, I post in Spanish language (my native language speaking)

In urlLink my personal diary I post a history (in Spanish language) about a succes in my life. Some things occurr in the three las days, god an bad, My english is so bad to write it in this language, but I need to write it. :( Sometimes bad things occurs, and we don't have control over this. In this moment, we need to write. Thanks to the words to said it ;) Edited 2/6/04 in the morning Oh!! God morning!! It's god to wake up and see the shinning sun in my face. Rest some hours raise from the dead somebody (Spanish expression jejeje ;))

Esta es la pagina de reunion de "Los Intocables" un grupo de amigos de un pueblecito llamado Alatoz (Albacete - España). Lo unico que pretendemos es crear un punto de runion donde compartir nuestras inquietudes, nuestros "tormentos" y alegrias, y porque no, hacer de internet una forma común de entretenernos y comunicarnos entre todos. Los interesados enviar un mail a methril_blog_at_ono_dot_com (sustituir '_at_' por @ y '_dot_' por punto) con la direccion de correo con la que os hayais dado de alta en www.blogger.com (es necesario para poder poner mensajes aki). Una abrazo y espero que podamos compartir muchas lineas por aki. Atentamente Rafa (aka methril) - o mas concretamente Rafa II -

Pues eso, que he montado una galeria de fotos a la que podeis subir todas las fotos con la calidad que me de la gana jejeje ;) Es mi server. Pues eso, la direccion es urlLink esta . Si teneis problemas contactar conmigo. Ese Jose!!! a ver si se anima y me las pasa, aunque sea por correo electrónico y vereis lo que ganamos todos ;) Un abrazo.. Rafa II (aka Methril)

Bueno, aunque parezca mentira la gente va callendo en los bodorrios. urlLink Aquí tenemos las primeras fotos (creo que provisionales) de la primera boda de este, nuestro entrañable grupo de amigos "Los intocables" jejejeje ;) Bueno, pues eso, que siguiendo el enlace podemos encontrar un album de fotos. En posteriores "actualizaciones" del futuro portal (esta en marcha, pero me falta tiempo) habra comentarios de las jugadas mas graciosas, foros y mucahs cosas mas. Un Abrazo a todos los que leais estas líneas y disfrutar con las fotos. P.D.: Gracias a Jose (er Pikoleto) por las fotos :P
